WonderkidAnswered on 18 Jun 2018Hi Shawn,​As Gabriel mentioned, either you could invest in an Gold ETF (Stock Symbol of GLD) or you could purchase the physical gold.​There are two types of assets:Non-Income Producing AssetsGold, Silver​Income Producing AssetsStocks, REITs (Pay Dividend)​Additionally, gold prices will be inversely correlate to the price of the dollar. It is a kind of risk management.See,All kind of gold investment is good. Some are advantageous than others, some are more expensive than others. Investing only in physical gold can be very expensive and inconvenient as selling and keeping it safe can be tedious.You can diversify by investing in gold ETFs, many investors in gold ETFs millions of dollars.
